CustomField.formula: IF( CASESAFEID(RecordTypeId) == $CustomMetadata.Constant__mdt.OpportuntiyInvestmentRecordTypeId.Value__c , IF(ISPICKVAL( StageName , "ACTIVE"), "ACTIVE", IF(ISPICKVAL( StageName , "Closed Won"), "ACTIVE", IF(ISPICKVAL( StageName , "Closed Lost"), "CLOSED", "RESERVED"))) ,"")
CustomField.label: Investment Status
